content.body: TabAtkins: hmm, was Python 3.12 really needed? This'll be a bunch more work. Oh well.

content.body: Bumping stuff in https://github.com/whatwg/spec-factory/pull/81. If anyone wants to bump Node and make sure participate.whatwg.org doesn't fall over I'd appreciate it.
I find these patching "methods" rather clunky and mechanical. Wouldn't `<slot>` work here?

content.body: It doesn't. It requires you to think of your whole document as a shadow root and that has too many side effects
